processing_structure.text: Input: one integer, Output: sum of its divisors (comment)
Loop from 1 to the input value
Check if the number divides evenly
If divisible, add it to the sum

advice.text: You are in the coding stage: some comments are implemented but the loop and printing are missing. Start turning the loop and divisor-check comments into code.
Plan the loop: iterate from 1 up to n, test divisibility using the remainder operation, and accumulate divisors into sum when the test passes.

Write a for-loop that checks each i from 1 to n; inside use a conditional to detect when n is divisible by i and add i to sum, then print: 'The sum of the divisors of <n> is <sum>' with your variables.
